83a852c8-3ae3-4e9b-91ae-023220aa3c5a.description: Earners of this badge have attended a SFIA Awareness session. This level of SFIA training provides an awareness and overview of the SFIA Skills and Competency Framework and an introduction to how it may be used.
83a852c8-3ae3-4e9b-91ae-023220aa3c5a.name: SFIA Training - Foundation Level

alignments.name: SFIA Foundation Level Training Syllabus
alignments.description: The syllabus is presented on the SFIA Website.

badge_template_activities.title: The SFIA Foundation Level Training course provides an awareness and overview of the SFIA Skills and Competency Framework and how it may be use. This course is typically of one hour duration.

7ed1b357-3c21-4b4e-aea4-fd934503dffc.description: Earners of this badge have undertaken Intermediate Level training in the SFIA Skills and Competency Framework. This level of SFIA training provides an overview of the SFIA Framework and how it can be used within an organisation to enhance and develop the skills and competency of the workforce.
7ed1b357-3c21-4b4e-aea4-fd934503dffc.name: Introduction to SFIA for Practitioners

alignments.name: SFIA Skills and Competency Framework
alignments.description: The SFIA Digital Skills and Competency Framework is used extensively throughout the World by countries, organisations and individuals to develop the skills and competencies of digital professionals and national workforces.

badge_template_activities.title: The Introduction to SFIA for Practitioner training provides an intermediate level training in the use of SFIA. It explores how the SFIA Framework may be used to enhance and develop the skills and competencies within an organisation. It is intended for those that are working with SFIA withinin an organisation that is already using SFIA. This course is typically of one half day duration. The syllabus is presented on the SFIA Website.

cb161c5d-b633-4479-b63f-1cd996eb9a40.description: A SFIA Accredited Consultant has demonstrated that they are operating at SFIA Level 5 or higher and have experience of leading skills and competency related organisational change programmes within organisations. They will be operating and influencing 'C-Level' executives and senior managers on the adoption and exploitation of SFIA for significant business benefit. They will additionally have demonstrated 'hands-on' operational use of SFIA.
cb161c5d-b633-4479-b63f-1cd996eb9a40.name: SFIA Accredited Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: The candidate makes an application that demonstrates their knowledge of SFIA and its application and implementation, and provides evidence that they have both hands-on experience of using SFIA and their leadership of a skills and competency activity within an organisation.
The SFIA Foundation assesses the applicant's application against the defined criteria for the SFIA Accredited Consultant role.
Provide evidence of their skills and leadership of a SFIA skills and competency activity.
This accreditation must be renewed annually.

88f32473-dace-4109-8a3d-9a1e25eceed1.description: Earners of this badge have attended an accredited SFIA Assessor Training course. This training provides an awareness and overview of assessment using the SFIA Skills and Competency Framework. The training prepares individuals to conduct skills and competency assessments using any framework but in particular the SFIA global standard.
88f32473-dace-4109-8a3d-9a1e25eceed1.name: SFIA Assessor Training

alignments.name: SFIA Skills and Competency Assessment Standard
alignments.description: The SFIA Skills and Competency Framework has become the global common reference standard for professional skills and levels of responsibility for the digital world. The SFIA Framework standard is available from the SFIA website.

alignments.name: SFIA Assessor Training Syllabus
alignments.description: The syllabus is presented on the SFIA Website and training is available through accredited training providers.

badge_template_activities.title: The SFIA Assessor Training course provides an awareness and overview of skills and competency assessment using a skills and competency framework and the SFIA global standard in particular. This course is typically of one day duration or equivalent - provided delegates have existing familiarity with the SFIA Framework - possibly through practitioner training.

da2b8b5a-4604-48df-a2ea-baaef5f75149.description: Earners of this badge have undertaken intermediate level training in the SFIA Skills and Competency Framework. This SFIA training provides a more in-depth overview of the SFIA Framework and how it can be used within an organisation to enhance and develop the skills and competency of its workforce. It I intended for those that are likely to be leading a skills programme within an organisation or who may be leading major skills and competency initiatives underpinned by the SFIA Framework.
da2b8b5a-4604-48df-a2ea-baaef5f75149.name: Introduction to SFIA for Consultants

alignments.name: SFIA Skills and Competency Framework
alignments.description: The SFIA Digital Skills and Competency Framework is used extensively throughout the World by countries, organisations and individuals to develop the skills and competencies of digital professionals and national workforces.

badge_template_activities.title: The Introduction to SFIA for Consultants training provides an intermediate level training in the use of SFIA. It offers a more in-depth introduction to SFIA for those that are likely to be using the SFIA Framework on wider areas and leading or initiating skills and competencies initiatives. This course is typically of one full day duration. The syllabus is presented on the SFIA Website.

f9136d3d-3b8c-4cd2-bc21-e803320aa1e4.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated that they have recent experience of conducting knowledge, skills or competency assessments under an accredited assessment scheme. This badge is renewed annually to ensure that earners continue to keep their knowledge and practice current and that they have current experience.
f9136d3d-3b8c-4cd2-bc21-e803320aa1e4.name: SFIA Accredited Assessor

alignments.name: SFIA Skills and Competency Framework
alignments.description: The SFIA Framework is the de facto global standard for skills and competency. It defies professional skills and competencies and behaviours at levels of responsibility. It is widely used internationally and is available in over 10 languages. It is available on a not-for-profit basis from the SFIA Foundation.

badge_template_activities.title: A candidate applies to become a SFIA Accredited Skills and Competency Assessor. They must demonstrate familiarity and understanding of the SFIA Skills and Competency Framework, that they are generally operating at SFIA Level 4 or above, they have recent experience of competency assessment at SFIA Level 4,and are operating under an accredited assessment scheme.

fe29ac5f-49e4-4d65-952e-3dae37a1b739.description: A SFIA Accredited Practitioner has demonstrated that they have been working at SFIA Level 4 or higher and have hands-on operational use of skills and competency development using SFIA. They may work under the guidance of a SFIA Accredited Consultant or alone where SFIA operational mechanisms are in place or of narrow scope.
fe29ac5f-49e4-4d65-952e-3dae37a1b739.name: SFIA Accredited Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: The candidate makes an application to the SFIA Foundation. This must demonstrate: knowledge of the SFIA Framework, practical experience of using SFIA, evidence of a hands-on role using SFIA, the ability to identify SFIA skills needed for a role, knowledge of how SFIA could be used in different management situations such as recruitment, deployment, assessment, and development.
The SFIA Foundation assesses the applicants application against the defined criteria for the SFIA Accredited Practitioner role.
The applicant must provide evidence of their skills and hands-on use of SFIA for skills and competency activities.

97e8b385-baf8-458c-8865-12f4308eae39.description: Earners of this badge have been assessed under a SFIA Foundation approved assessment scheme. They have demonstrated competence in Acceptance testing at SFIA Level 2: Validating systems, products, business processes or services to determine whether the acceptance criteria have been satisfied.
97e8b385-baf8-458c-8865-12f4308eae39.name: Acceptance testing - Competency - Level 2

badge_template_activities.title: The applicant has provided evidence to demonstrate that they have practiced the SFIA Professional Skill and the SFIA Generic Attributes / Behavioural Factors at the level badged within a real-world professional working environment.

The assessment for this badge is carried out under a SFIA Foundation approved scheme using approved assessment processes, applying approved assessment criteria, and conducted by a SFIA Accredited Assessor.
